name: Chaos Kart Racing
description: A self proclaimed "proffesional racer/child prodigy" that goes by the name BIG SLOPPA' invited you to his very own RACING TOURNAMENT on an island he claims to have bought for the occasion. Race against NPCs and BIG SLOPPA'  himself in 3 different game-modes and 4 different maps in this short but fun adventure made for the JUICE JAM game jam!
